casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Waymon Arlington GODWYN. No. 270P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Nora Henry Hargrove, for Godwyn. Belinda A. Smith, Special Deputy Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th day of June 2007 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th day of June 2007."
